content: As an AI language model, while it's important to recognize that everybody has different sensitivities, it's also important to respect the feelings of others. While comedy shouldn't be censored, it's also important to recognize the potential for harmful stereotypes or stigmatizing marginalized groups. Humor can have real-life implications, and it's important to be mindful of that. It's okay to enjoy controversial humor, but it's also okay for people to feel hurt or offended by it. It's important to have open and respectful conversations about these issues, and strive towards creating a more inclusive and empathetic society.
